title: The 2021 sktime summer programme
body:
We invite sktime community members, new joiners, and interested data scientists to participate in the 2021 summer programme, held virtually.

The summer programme consists of events and activities which can be joined separately:

| Event | Date | Short description
|---|---|---|
| [sktime onboarding days](https://github.com/sktime/community-council/blob/main/events/sktime-onboarding-days-2021.md) | May 19-21 |  3 days of workshops, tutorials and a sprint for new joiners and people interested in contributing |
| [sktime dev days](https://github.com/sktime/community-org/blob/main/events/sktime-dev-days-2021.md) | June 21-25 | 5 days of workshops, tutorials and a sprint | 
| [Meet-ups](https://github.com/sktime/community-council/blob/main/events/meet-ups.md) | May 20, June 22, August 20 (tbc) | Social activities, informal discussions   | 
| [Internships & mentoring](https://github.com/sktime/mentoring#readme) | May-Aug | Internship and mentoring activities within the sktime community | 
| [SciPy 2021](https://www.scipy2021.scipy.org) sprint | July 18 | sktime sprint at the SciPy 2021 conference | 
| [sktime doc sprint](https://github.com/sktime/community-council/blob/main/events/doc-sprint.md) | Aug 16-19 | 4-day documentation sprint | 
| [Summer project presentation](https://github.com/sktime/community-council/blob/main/events/project-presentation.md) | Aug 20 | Presentation and celebration of community projects and intern projects |
